title: Watch Face Flip Clock 2in1
summary: 2in1 Blak and White Flip Clock Watch Face for Android Wear
description: Pimp your watch with realistic Flip Clock Watch Face. Wait a minute2. Go to Android Wear Application3. Choose Black or White Flip Watch Face4. descriptionHTML:
Pimp your watch with realistic Flip Clock Watch Face. Clean and fast interfase for everyday use.

FEATURES:

- 2in1: Dark and White Watch Faces
- 12/24 auto-format
- High Resolution Design
- Round and Square watches Support

INSTRUCTION:

1. Install Watch Face
2. Wait a minute
2. Go to Android Wear Application
3. Choose Black or White Flip Watch Face
4. Enjoy!

The flip clock watch face has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch and other.
comments: No flip animation I'll buy it when there's an animation.
